sections.title: Managing Conversation History
sections.content:
Claude Code maintains conversation history with intelligent context management:

  • /clear - Start fresh (clears context)
  • /compact - Compress conversation (keeps context)
  • History persists between sessions
sections.example:
# When context gets too large
claude /compact

# Starting a new unrelated task
claude /clear
claude "New task: Create a payment integration"

sections.title: Essential Slash Commands
sections.content:
Master these commands for efficient workflow:

  • /init - Initialize CLAUDE.md for your project
  • /cost - Check token usage and costs
  • /doctor - Diagnose installation issues
  • /pr_comments - View GitHub PR feedback
sections.example:
# Set up project memory
claude /init

# Check usage
claude /cost

# View PR comments
claude /pr_comments https://github.com/org/repo/pull/123

sections.title: Custom Slash Commands
sections.content: Create project-specific commands to automate repetitive tasks. Define them in your settings.json.
